title: Placements - Explanations please?
body:
Hello, 
I always get 7 wins - 3 L in placements ( every season) . s3 i went to gold V (i was unranked) , s4 i went to gold V , s5 i went to silver 1 .
I always finished the seasons in gold , last season i finished in gold 2. 
Now i do my placements,  7w-3L and i get placed in Silver 3? 
Why such a harsh drop ? What's behind the calculations in the division u get placed?
